Title: Exempts the sale of cloth face coverings used to prevent the spread of the novel coronavirus, COVID-19 from sales and use taxes
Summary: Exempts the sale of cloth face coverings used to prevent the spread of the novel coronavirus, COVID-19 from sales and use taxes; defines "cloth face coverings" as any material manufactured with the intent of covering the nose and mouth that can be secured to the head or ears with ties or straps.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting the sale of cloth face coverings used to prevent the spread of the novel coronavirus, COVID-19 from sales and use taxes
